derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in sense 2): named after the city and province of Bergamo in northern Italy
early 17th cent.: from French bergamotte, from Italian bergamotta, from Turkish begarmudu 'prince's pear', from beg 'prince' + armud 'pear' + the possessive suffix -u
